backlog.title: Telegram bot receives content and routes to inbox
backlog.rationale: Currently content intake only works when user is in Claude Code session. Telegram integration lets user send links/ideas anytime, agent processes on next wake-up. Unlocks async content curation.

backlog.title: Daemon pulls git before executing, pushes after
backlog.rationale: Ensures state consistency between local dev and droplet. Without this, state can diverge and cause conflicts.

backlog.title: Price tracking for open positions
backlog.rationale: Can't evaluate P&L without current prices. market-watcher agent needs to update portfolio.json with live prices from Polymarket MCP.

backlog.title: Leaderboard scraper for top trader analysis
backlog.rationale: Hypothesis hyp-004 requires analyzing top traders. Need tool to fetch and parse leaderboard data. Could reveal edge patterns.

backlog.title: Telegram alerts for position changes and key events
backlog.rationale: Keep user informed of agent activity. Alert on: trades executed, hypotheses validated/invalidated, escalation triggers hit.

backlog.title: Backtest framework for strategy validation
backlog.rationale: Currently can only forward-test. Historical data + backtest would accelerate hypothesis validation. Check if Polymarket provides historical data first.

backlog.title: Audit and improve subagent prompts
backlog.rationale: 8 subagents exist but quality unknown. Review each, test with real tasks, improve underperformers. Better agents = better autonomous operation.
